member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_RUNTIME_STATUS_ACTIVE_STATUS
member.summary: The EC_SUBSCRIPTION_RUNTIME_STATUS_ACTIVE_STATUS enumeration specifies the status of a subscription or an event source with respect to a subscription.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_RUNTIME_STATUS_ACTIVE_STATUS.EcRuntimeStatusActiveStatusDisabled
member.summary: The subscription or event source is disabled.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_RUNTIME_STATUS_ACTIVE_STATUS.EcRuntimeStatusActiveStatusActive
member.summary: The subscription or event source is running.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_RUNTIME_STATUS_ACTIVE_STATUS.EcRuntimeStatusActiveStatusInactive
member.summary: The subscription or event source is inactive. You can query the System event log to see the error events sent by the Event Collector service. Use the values to obtain information on why the subscription or source is inactive.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_RUNTIME_STATUS_ACTIVE_STATUS.EcRuntimeStatusActiveStatusTrying
member.summary: The subscription or event source is trying to connect for the first time or is retrying after a problem. When an active subscription runs into a problem, it will retry several times.
